name: LazyLoad Post Gallery
author: Steeve Lefebvre (slWsu)

sections.description:
This plugin adds a lightbox to the native galleries of WordPress articles.

Features Include

  • Carousel lightbox multi galleries.
  • Choice of the number of columns.
  • Loading images with lazy Load.

Configuration

  1. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  2. Go to the plugin setting page, and configure to your wishes.
  3. Create a new article and add a wordpress gallery and validate.
  4. You can go see your article, the gallery should be present.

Credits

  • Logo by Hélène titre “graphic designer”
sections.installation:
We now offer an installation service to assist you in this process. We will install any or all of our plugins and spend up to 2 hours with you for consultation and training. Visit our website for details.
My Local Webstop Plugin

Or

  • Navigate to Add New Plugin page within your WordPress
  • Search for Quiz Master Next
  • Click Install Now link on the plugin and follow the prompts
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Or

  • Upload plugin dir to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
